abstract: A leader in communications, banking and bottling, Mr. Llewellyn was among the nation’s most prominent and wealthiest black executives.
snippet: A leader in communications, banking and bottling, Mr. Llewellyn was among the nation’s most prominent and wealthiest black executives.
lead_paragraph: J. Bruce Llewellyn, whose success in fields as varied as banking, broadcasting, Coca-Cola bottling and groceries made him one of the most prominent black businessmen in America, died Wednesday night at his home in Manhattan. He was 82.

headline.main: J. Bruce Llewellyn, Who Forged a Path for Blacks in Business, Is Dead at 82
headline.print_headline: J. Bruce Llewellyn, Who Forged a Path For Blacks in Business, Is Dead at 82
